data.prayer: Father, we ask for 721 new simple churches in the county of Tangail, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Place a simple church in every community of the 3,605,100 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tangail, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Tangail to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Tangail, Dhaka, Bangladesh be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Tangail. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bedia (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Tangail who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, help the 4,516 believers in Tangail to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,600,584 lost friends and neighbors.
There are 3,605,100 people living in the county of Tangail. Only about 4,516 might be believers.

location.name: Tangail
location.people_groups_list: Nagarchi (Muslim traditions), Tiyar, Karadar, Daphtari, Pod
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) (13,000), Tiyar (60,000), Karadar (2,400), Daphtari (600), Pod (9,600)
